title: High Voltage Direct Current Distribution Electrical Master Box
objective:
This document adress the LEACH International Europe proposal  to the HVDC electrical master box (HVEMB) for the Cleansky 2 helicopter demonstrator in the scope of CS2-2014-CFP01-FRC-02-08 call.

LIEÃ­s objective through this project is to develop the next generation of Power Distribution Unit based on a new generation of high voltage commutation devices, themselves based on electromechanical and electronic switching components.
